verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of the sons of Korah. Maschil. We have heard <S%H8085><s%> with our ears <S%H241><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, Our fathers <S%H1><s%> have told <S%H5608><s%> us <S%H6467><s%>, What work thou didst <S%H6466><s%> in their days <S%H3117><s%>, In the days <S%H3117><s%> of old <S%H6924><s%>.

Thou didst drive out <S%H3423><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> with thy hand <S%H3027><s%>; But them thou didst plant <S%H5193><s%>: Thou didst afflict <S%H7489><s%> the peoples <S%H3816><s%>; But them thou didst spread abroad <S%H7971><s%>.

For they gat <S%H3423><s%> not the land <S%H776><s%> in possession <S%H3423><s%> by their own sword <S%H2719><s%>, Neither did their own arm <S%H2220><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> them <S%H3225><s%>; But thy right hand, and thine arm <S%H2220><s%>, and the light <S%H216><s%> of thy countenance <S%H6440><s%>, Because thou wast favorable unto them <S%H7521><s%>.
Thou art my King <S%H4428><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>: Command <S%H6680><s%> deliverance <S%H3444><s%> for Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.
Through thee will we push down <S%H5055><s%> our adversaries <S%H6862><s%>: Through thy name <S%H8034><s%> will we tread them under <S%H947><s%> that rise up against us <S%H6965><s%>.
For I will not trust <S%H982><s%> in my bow <S%H7198><s%>, Neither shall my sword <S%H2719><s%> save me <S%H3467><s%>.
But thou hast saved <S%H3467><s%> us from our adversaries <S%H6862><s%>, And hast put them to shame <S%H954><s%> that hate us <S%H8130><s%>.
In God <S%H430><s%> have we made our boast <S%H1984><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%> long <S%H3034><s%>, And we will give thanks unto thy name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
But <S%H637><s%> now thou hast cast us off <S%H2186><s%>, and brought us to dishonor <S%H3637><s%>, And goest not forth <S%H3318><s%> with our hosts <S%H6635><s%>.
Thou makest us to turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H268><s%> from the adversary <S%H6862><s%>; And they that hate <S%H8130><s%> us take spoil for themselves <S%H8154><s%>.
Thou hast made <S%H5414><s%> us like sheep <S%H6629><s%> appointed for food <S%H3978><s%>, And hast scattered <S%H2219><s%> us among the nations <S%H1471><s%>.
Thou sellest <S%H4376><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> for nought <S%H1952><s%>, And hast not increased <S%H7235><s%> thy wealth by their price <S%H4242><s%>.
Thou makest <S%H7760><s%> us a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to our neighbors <S%H7934><s%>, A scoffing <S%H3933><s%> and a derision <S%H7047><s%> to them that are round about us <S%H5439><s%>.
Thou makest <S%H7760><s%> us a byword <S%H4912><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, A shaking <S%H4493><s%> of the head <S%H7218><s%> among the peoples <S%H3816><s%>.
All <S%H3117><s%> the day long is my dishonor <S%H1322><s%> before me <S%H1322><s%>, And the shame of my face <S%H6440><s%> hath covered me <S%H3680><s%>,
For the voice <S%H6963><s%> of him that reproacheth <S%H2778><s%> and blasphemeth <S%H1442><s%>, By reason <S%H6440><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%> and the avenger <S%H5358><s%>.
All this is come <S%H935><s%> upon us <S%H7911><s%>; Yet have we not forgotten thee <S%H8266><s%>, Neither have we dealt falsely in thy covenant <S%H1285><s%>.
Our heart <S%H3820><s%> is not turned <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H268><s%>, Neither have our steps <S%H838><s%> declined <S%H5186><s%> from thy way <S%H734><s%>,
That thou hast sore broken <S%H1794><s%> us in the place <S%H4725><s%> of jackals <S%H8577><s%>, And covered <S%H3680><s%> us with the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%>.
If we have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>, Or spread forth <S%H6566><s%> our hands <S%H3709><s%> to a strange <S%H2114><s%> god <S%H410><s%>;
Will not God <S%H430><s%> search this out <S%H2713><s%>? For he knoweth <S%H3045><s%> the secrets <S%H8587><s%> of the heart <S%H3820><s%>.
Yea <S%H2026><s%>, for thy sake are we killed all the day <S%H3117><s%> long <S%H2803><s%>; We are accounted as sheep <S%H6629><s%> for the slaughter <S%H2878><s%>.
Awake <S%H5782><s%>, why sleepest <S%H3462><s%> thou <S%H136><s%>, O Lord? Arise <S%H6974><s%>, cast us not off <S%H2186><s%> for ever <S%H5331><s%>.
Wherefore hidest <S%H5641><s%> thou thy face <S%H6440><s%>, And forgettest <S%H7911><s%> our affliction <S%H6040><s%> and our oppression <S%H3906><s%>?
For our soul <S%H5315><s%> is bowed down <S%H7743><s%> to the dust <S%H6083><s%>: Our body <S%H990><s%> cleaveth <S%H1692><s%> unto the earth <S%H776><s%>.
Rise <S%H6965><s%> up for our help <S%H5833><s%>, And redeem <S%H6299><s%> us for thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>' sake.
